properties.areaDesc: Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Quay County; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Harding County; Southwest Chaves County; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Guadalupe County; Eastern San Miguel County; Union County; Far Northeast Highlands; South Central Mountains
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 2:42AM MST until January 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque NM
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected.
Stronger gusts to 55 mph likely over the peaks and along the
east slopes of the Sangre De Cristo Mountains.

* WHERE...The Sangre De Cristo Mountains east to the Texas and
Oklahoma border, including the eastern highlands, the South
Central Mountains, eastern Lincoln and southwest Chaves Counties.

* WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon,
peaking during the afternoon hours.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few
power outages are possible. Strong crosswinds on north to south
oriented roadways will make travel difficult, especially for
high profile vehicles.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should exercise caution while travelling. Sudden gusts
of wind may cause you to lose control of your vehicle. Extra
attention should be given to cross winds. Secure lightweight
outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
